snippet: A defendant who successfully uses a self-defense claim is entitled to reimbursement for lost wages and other costs, as well as legal fees, a court ruled.
abstract: Washington State appeals court says that a defendant who successfully used self-defense claim is entitled to reimbursement for lost wages and other costs, as well as legal fees, major ruling on the 'stand your ground' debate over personal safety.
lead_paragraph: A defendant who successfully uses a self-defense claim is entitled to reimbursement for lost wages and other costs, as well as legal fees, a court ruled.

headline.main: Court Rules on ‘Stand Your Ground’ Costs
headline.print_headline: Court Rules on ‘Stand Your Ground’ Costs
